title: Channel24.co.za | Boity Thulo: I also had to drop out of university
text:
Boity's story is similar to that of rapper Yanga who also revealed he dropped out over varsity fees. I know what it feels like to drop out coz of fees. â€” MANTSHINGILANE (@ItsYangaChief) October 20, 2015 
The protests have also encouraged Scandal actress Dineo Moeketsi to open up about her battles with varsity fees while studying in America. A photo posted by Dineo Moeketsi (@dineomoeketsi) on Oct 21, 2015 at 11:49am PDT 
And while social media is filled with celebs messages on the strike, a few of our favourites including DJ Sbu decided to not just talk the talk but march the march. A video posted by SbuLeope (@sbuleope) on Oct 22, 2015 at 12:41am PDT 
And, there's even been a track made in support of the protests...
